Paintball Gun and Gloves - Blue Splattered (for Female)
kDesc
A little paint never hurt anyone. Although when it's fired out of a gun, it kinda does. \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
Un peu de peinture n'a jamais fait de mal à personne, sauf si elle est tirée d'un pistolet. \n\n Créé par Double Time - Jouez pour gagner, jouer Double Time. [#Legal]
Ein bisschen Farbe tut keinem weh. Aber wenn sie aus einer Kanone abgefeuert wird – irgendwie schon. \n\n Entworfen von Double Time – Spiel für den Sieg, spiel Double Time [#Legal]
Un po' di pittura non ha mai fatto male a nessuno. Anche se, se viene sparata con un pistola, un po' di male lo fa. \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
Un poco de pintura no le hace daño a nadie. Aunque cuando se dispara con una pistola, un poco de daño sí que hace. \n\n Creado por Double Time; juega para ganar, juega con Double Time. [#Legal]
少しくらいの汚れは誰も傷つけないが、銃から放たれるとそうでもない [#Legal]
페인트가 조금 묻는다고 누가 다치는 건 아니죠. 총에서 발사되면 그건 다른 얘기이지만요. \n\n Double Time 제작 - 승리를 위한 플레이, 플레이 더블 타임 [#Legal]
A little paint never hurt anyone. Although when it's fired out of a gun, it kinda does. \n\n Created by Double Time – Play to Win, Play Double Time. [#Legal]
多點油漆不會死人的。雖然被漆彈槍打到還是挺痛。\n\n Double Time榮譽出品：勝利精品，就是Double Time。 [#Legal]
